thread.title: Shabana Azmi's hotel troubles

author: timesofindia.indiatimes.com
title: Shabana Azmi's hotel troubles
text:
Staying in hotels is an indispensable part of an actor's life. But veteran actress Shabana Azmi feels each facility should follow some fixed pointers.
READ: â€‹ Shabana Azmi turns 65, thanks fans for their support
"Hotels please get three things right. Plug points for mobiles on either side of bed, good lighting around bathroom mirror, plug point for iron board," Shabana tweeted on Sunday.
For latest Bollywood updates, follow us on Twitter >>> @TOIEntertain
For the latest in Bollywood news, like us on Facebook >>> TOIEntertain
The actress, who is awaiting release of Sanjay Gupta's Jazbaa , went on to add that she has a choice of laundry, but she loves to iron her clothes. "Before you say give clothes to laundry I have to add I ENJOY ironing," she added.

For latest Bollywood updates, follow us on G+ >>> The Times of India Entertainment
Aishwarya Rai Bachchan's much-anticipated comeback film Jazbaa is scheduled to release on October 9.
